items.question: How does the AI teacher adapt to my learning style?
items.answer: Our AI analyzes how you learn best—whether through videos, explanations, examples, or practice problems. It tracks your progress in real-time and adjusts difficulty, pacing, and teaching methods accordingly.

items.question: Can I use this alongside traditional schooling?
items.answer: Absolutely! Many students use our platform to supplement their studies, get extra help with difficult subjects, or prepare for exams. You control when and how much you learn.

items.question: What subjects are available?
items.answer: We cover Math, Science, English, History, Languages, and professional skills. New courses are added regularly based on student demand.

items.question: Is there a community aspect?
items.answer: Yes! You can join study groups, participate in challenges, and connect with other learners. Our community features help you stay motivated and learn together.

items.question: What happens after my 14-day trial?
items.answer: After the trial, you can choose a plan that works for you. We offer flexible pricing with no long-term contracts—cancel anytime.
